name: Hentai Casino
description:
Your girlfriend is asking you for money, so you face a tough choice:
Work hard to advance in your job, and perhaps your boss will reward you ;)
OR
Go to casino and trust your luck. Win money and unlock new girls!

Casino

In the casino, you can try your luck on the slot machine. Draw girls and multipliers to get as much cash and girls as possible. There are a total of 17 different girls.

Work

Work hard by playing funny mini-games and earn money and respect from the hot boss lady.
